name: Novotel Berlin Am Tiergarten

reviews.text: I stayed here for a week during a business/tourist trip. The room looked exactly like other Novotels I have stayed in. All of the furnishings were very new and modern. The location was great, since the Tiergarten S-bahn station is right across the street. If you get a tourist pass, you can get to all of the major tourist sites in under ten minutes.
reviews.title: Decent hotel, convenient location

reviews.text: The restaurant was excellent, if a bit spendy. I had a couple of dinners there, and everything I tried was tasty.
reviews.title: Very good choice

reviews.title: Excellent value
reviews.text: This is one of the best Novotel's I've stayed in. The location is good - quiet at night, but right next to the S Bahn station with easy links all over the city. There is a shop in the station where you can buy cold drinks and snacks which are cheaper than using the mini bar. There's also a good licensed restaurant/cafe open all day from breakfast, called the Giraffe, with a nice outside seating area. Its just under the railway arch past the back of the local burger king. There is also a flea market right outside the hotel on Saturday and Sunday - a bit junky but interesting to wander around. The hotel itself was very clean and the staff very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are a very good size and offered separate shower and bath. A couple of things to note: We were a group of 6 people and the lifts will only let you travel to the floor that your room key is programmed to which can be a bit annoying. The aircon is a bit tame on a hot day and the bar prices are a little steep. However the bar area is lovely and there's outdoor seating too. All in all, a very good choice at a very reasonable price. You could do a lot worse. I probably wouldn't recommend for those wanting to be in the middle of the night life though.

reviews.title: What a New Year
reviews.text: What a fantastic location for a New Year break in Berlin. And what a superb hotel with some of the best staff we have encountered. We booked a 3 night stay with 2 friends through Ryanair and took advantage of a very cheap flight and hotel deal. We wanted to be near the main festivities for new years Eve and we had a 20 to 30 minute walk towards the Brandenburg Gate area where there was a huge party taking place. We took the train from the airport at Schonefeld directly to Tiergarten and the hotel is just across the road from the station. The trains are cheap to use and we had access to most areas within the city in a matter of minutes. The hotel rooms are large and exceptionally comfortable, the staff excellent and we would not hesitate to return here if visiting Berlin.

All I can do is confirm what so many others have already written. Undoubtably the best Novotel I have ever stayed at yet the lowest priced. Every aspect was excellent and professional- breakfast was fantastic, rooms were spotless, location across a sidestreet from the Tiergarten S-bahnhof is so convenient. They have a much better wi-fi deal than other Novotels, where you can get a voucher that lasts from 6pm til the next morning. I even got a thankyou letter from management welcoming me back whenever I am in Berlin. I would stay there again without a doubt.
reviews.title: Excellent on all criteria

reviews.text: Novotel Berlin Am Tiergarten was a modern, well-furnished, clean hotel. Everything you would expect from a 4* business hotel. The location was excellent, situated directly opposite a train station which has links to central Berlin, the train takes only 5 or so minutes.

reviews.text: The hotel is modern, well maintained, clean and tidy, and comfortable. My room was spacious, with a large bathroom, big comfortable bed, and lots of work space. I had to work late one evening, and it was easy to find lots of desk space for papers, laptop, etc. Wireless was expensive, but do ask at the front desk for a "business" rate, as they will sell you five days of wireless access for a much more reasonable rate!

description: The new Novotel Berlin Am Tiergarten features a design concept for the future with bright colours, natural materials and ergonomic forms. This 4 star hotel is located between the Kurfurstendamm and the Brandenburg Gate with transport links to the main train station, the airports and the exhibition centre. 274 airconditioned rooms and 11 meeting rooms welcome business and leisure travellers from around the world. Enjoy the views over Berlin from the spa area or Mediterranean cuisine in our restaurant.
